product_name: Mountain House Lasagna With Meat Sauce - 5 Servings
long_description: Instant lasagna with beef chunks, noodles and cheese smothered in an Italian tomato sauce. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Quick and filling meal for camping and backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents.
short_description: Instant lasagna with beef chunks, noodles and cheese smothered in an Italian tomato sauce.
